shri lankikayanta adu piriwaya guwan pahasukam labadima aramunu karagena aarambha kala mihin lanka guwan sewaye thewani guwan yanaya pereda (20) madhyama rathriye katunayaka guwanthotupalin meratata langa wiya.mihin lanka guwan yana balaaniya shakthimath karamin meratata langa wu ema samajikaya aasana 180 kin samanwitha eyar bas ee 320-200 madiliye thani panthi guwan yanayak wana athara karyaya mandalaya rahitha badu yatathe meratata sewaya karayi.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sankalpayak matha 2007 wasaredi ek guwan gamananthayakin arambai mihin lanka guwan sewaya me wana wita ihala diyunuwak labamin guwan gamanantha atak athpath kara gena sitina bawa rajya ha podu katayuthu pilibanda kalamanakaru gamini abewardhana mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.buddhagaya, baranasa, trichi, daka, jakartha, dubayi, saja, baharen yana gamanantha wetha piyasara karana mihin lanka mema wasare desambar masa madureyi saha labana wasare pebarawari masa dilli bala piyasara kirimata balaporoththu we.pilipinaye klaks sita pamini nawa guwan yanaya piliganimata mihin lanka pradhana widhayaka niladhari kapila chandrasena mahatha athulu pirisak guwanthotupalata pamina sitiyaha..

me gana liyannata pera , wrushana pilikawa saha ehi yatha swabhawaya pilibandawa apa as idiripita , praeyagikawa penwa di , thama uwatane siti mawata menma , sewaye siti apa as walatada kandulu ek kala , karapitiya pilika ekkaye prathikara gath ekthara kolu gatayaku sihipath kala yuthumayi nawatha upadina bhawayaka ewan wedana nowewayi pathiya yuthumaya.

wada warjanayen pasuwa wruththiya samithi wetha lipiyak yawu watawala wathu samagama lonach waththa digata ma pawathwagena yame apahasuthawa nisa, eya yali sakriya thaththwayata ganima sandaha kiri ahara nishpadana gowipola wyapruthiyak thaman yojana kara athi bawa yi.
me linkuwath damanna.
me wana wita unnachchiya wawa kethwathu poshanaya karamin, paniya jalaya laba demin, madakalapuwe dahaya niwamin saha sancharakayan das pinawamin sobadahamehima kotasak bawata pathwi thibe.

namuth sha=ddha aathmawa yana thanathuru samaga, sahanakaruwa gana jesus wahanse handunwa di athi wisthara kisiseth nosasande.
sini prakruthiya thibena ushnadhika sharira thibena ayata iruwaradaya hadunama hungak amaruyi.
apa siyaluma denage jiwithaya thula sapa ha sathuta thiranaya wannema thaman karana lada kriyakarakam anuwayi.
wairi deshapalanaya nisa awurudu dekak mata pol sambolayi bathuyi kanna sidu wuna.
ohu sitiye ketharam apahasuwenda yath wenada ohuge muhune pawathina saragi bawa musu aadambaraya kohe ho adu wi athayi siyallanta penina.
mama kiyanne, mama therum gaththa ohu me siddhiyata aayojanayak kara kiyala, eeth niwyok polisiya baddha wairayen wada karanne na.
enam thamage winodaya sa`daha wiwidhakara wu wihilu thahalu magini.
